mapper.select: SELECT ROOMNUM, FEEDNUM, IDNUM, ID, NAME, PHOTO, NICKNAME, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, WRITETIME, COUNT FROM FEED_VIEW WHERE ROOMNUM = #{roomNum} ORDER BY WRITETIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED(FEED_NUM, MEM_JOIN_NUM, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (CONCAT('FEED-',LPAD(FEED_SEQ.NEXTVAL,5,0)), (SELECT MAX(MEM_JOIN_NUM) FROM MEM_JOIN MJ JOIN MEM_REGI MR ON MJ.ID_NUM = MR.ID_NUM WHERE MR.ID_NUM = #{idNum} AND MJ.ROOM_NUM = #{roomNum}) , (SELECT M.NIKNAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEM_REGI MR ON M.ID_NUM = MR.ID_NUM WHERE ID = #{id}) || ' 님이 입장하였습니다.', SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO FEED(FEED_NUM, MEM_JOIN_NUM, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (CONCAT('FEED-',LPAD(FEED_SEQ.NEXTVAL,5,0)), (SELECT MAX(MEM_JOIN_NUM) FROM MEM_JOIN MJ JOIN MEM_REGI MR ON MJ.ID_NUM = MR.ID_NUM WHERE MR.ID_NUM = #{idNum} AND MJ.ROOM_NUM = #{roomNum}) , (SELECT NIKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID_NUM = #{idNum}) || ' 님이 퇴장하였습니다.', SYSDATE)
